1:
Yahweh our Lord, how magnificent is your name in all the earth,\q you who reveal your glory in the heavens above.
\q
2:
Out of the mouth of babies and infants you have established praise\q because of your enemies,
\q so that you might silence both the enemy and the avenger.


\q
3:
When I look up at your heavens, which your fingers have made,\q the moon and the stars, which you have set in place,
\q
4:
Of what importance is the human race that you notice them,\q or mankind that you pay attention to them?
\q
5:
Yet you have made them only a little lower than the heavenly beings\q and have crowned them with glory and honor.


\q
6:
You make him to rule over the works of your hands;\q you have put all things under his feet:
\q
7:
all sheep and oxen,\q and even the animals of the field,
\q
8:
the birds of the heavens, and the fish of the sea,\q everything that passes through the currents of the seas.


\q
9: Yahweh our Lord,\q how magnificent is your name in all the earth!
